about.description:
Glow is an open-source toolkit for working with genomic data at
biobank-scale and beyond. The toolkit is natively built on Apache Spark,
the leading unified engine for big data processing and machine learning,
enabling the scale of the cloud for genomics workflows.
about.summary: An open-source toolkit for large-scale genomic analysis

about.description:
Glow is an open-source toolkit for working with genomic data at
biobank-scale and beyond. The toolkit is natively built on Apache Spark,
the leading unified engine for big data processing and machine learning,
enabling the scale of the cloud for genomics workflows.
about.summary: An open-source toolkit for large-scale genomic analysis

name: glow
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "glow" %}
{% set pypi_name = "glow.py" %}
{% set version = "1.0.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ pypi_name[0] }}/{{ pypi_name }}/{{ pypi_name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 719dd3b15981eb10ec607fa03ab0c1d5b53744bc0e9a0f899427e80b7e307e4b

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=3.7
    - pyspark >=2.4.0
    - nptyping >=1.3.0
    - numpy >=1.18.1
    - opt_einsum >=3.2.0
    - pandas >=1.0.1
    - statsmodels >=0.10.0
    - typeguard >=2.9.1

test:
  imports:
    - glow
    - glow.gwas
    - glow.wgr

about:
  home: https://projectglow.io
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_family: Apache
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: 'An open-source toolkit for large-scale genomic analysis'
  description: |
    Glow is an open-source toolkit for working with genomic data at 
    biobank-scale and beyond. The toolkit is natively built on Apache Spark, 
    the leading unified engine for big data processing and machine learning, 
    enabling the scale of the cloud for genomics workflows.
  doc_url: https://glow.readthedocs.io/
  dev_url: https://github.com/projectglow/glow

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - henrydavidge
    - karenfeng
    - kianfar77
